math.alttext: Y({\bf r},{\bf r}^{\prime};\epsilon,y)=\frac{1}{\pi}\lim_{\gamma\rightarrow 0}% \,\langle B({\bf r},{\bf r}^{\prime})B({\bf r}^{\prime},{\bf r})\rangle\;,

Y({\bf r},{\bf r}^{\prime};\epsilon,y)=\frac{1}{\pi}\lim_{\gamma\rightarrow 0}% \,\langle B({\bf r},{\bf r}^{\prime})B({\bf r}^{\prime},{\bf r})\rangle\;,

math.alttext: P(\epsilon,y)=\frac{1}{V}\int{\rm d}{\bf r}\,{\rm d}{\bf r}^{\prime}\,Y({\bf r% },{\bf r}^{\prime};\epsilon,y)\;
